org.flexiblepower.efi.buffer

Class BufferUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flexiblepower.ral.messages.ResourceMessage
      • org.flexiblepower.ral.messages.ControlSpaceUpdate
        • org.flexiblepower.efi.buffer.BufferUpdate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferStateUpdate, BufferSystemDescription, BufferTargetProfileUpdate, BufferUsageForecast

    public abstract class BufferUpdate
extends ControlSpaceUpdate
    This class is derived from ControlSpaceUpdate and is used to bundle all updates from an appliance of the buffer category.

        Parameters:
        resourceId - The resource identifier
